surface slip_stitch surface slip_stitch begin by inserting your hook through your work where you would like to begin make a slip knot on your hook your slip knot should be at the back of your work pull your hook up through your work so your hook with 1 loop is now at the front of your work insert your hook into the next indicated stitch yo pull the loop to the front of your work and pull through the loop on your hook continue until you reach your beginning slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends when working surface slip_stitch begin one or two stitches away from your corner to give
